name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"ac542cbb-eb5c-44d3-90ee-d966f6959f8a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyErrors","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"903b21d0-2ef0-4e29-833d-1fdd18478e3e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyErrors","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is a specialized data collector used to track potential runtime dictionary lookup failures discovered during the analysis. It serves as a diagnostic registry, capturing the specific locations where code attempts to access keys that the analyzer has flagged as potentially missing or problematic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e8158d2c-6dc5-4dbb-9162-008e3894c7c1","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"33a1d451-619d-412a-8cb1-f89dfb6f4c2a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b1cfd8a9-06e2-45ab-a0b5-65fa51ac8cb4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"key_errs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): An internal collection of error records. Each record is stored as a dictionary containing the coordinates and context of the suspected error.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3684221e-3a7d-4736-b212-8706e048a9b5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e78b6ce2-3e50-4622-a28d-837b959e74e2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"49789fa0-fee8-42d7-be9f-94bfe1d825a1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Initializes the collector with an empty list. This instance typically accumulates errors throughout the entire duration of a scan.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1d550313-6e51-4466-860e-d583430be1fc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add(filename, lineno, namespace, key)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Registers a new potential ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyError","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" incident.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"754eb007-5eef-466b-90b8-2e9a20162eed","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"filename","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The path to the source file where the issue was detected.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"92b9d908-1d5e-443a-836d-8f0a25c98820","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"lineno","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The exact line number of the suspect access.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ddf997ef-8e73-4ebc-bd4b-905dffe007ad","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"namespace","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The functional or class scope (namespace) where the error occurred.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"43effe93-072b-4164-bb33-6ae0dd6c6839","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"key","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The specific key name that caused the concern.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"aaf704ef-4656-4477-8ca3-48136f545f56","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves all recorded error objects. This is typically used at the end of an analysis run to generate a final report for the user.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c6962fbc-e297-4024-978a-e932c5daa173","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e3d3adf4-c4da-48b7-90ca-23a54fd586c5","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"53dc7048-8747-4688-9467-5fbbf7b52436","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer uses this class when it detects a dictionary access that cannot be safely resolved.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17f8cd4a-6478-438d-b076-bb2f0ceff5d0","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"from errors import KeyErrors

# 1. Initialize the error tracker
error_tracker = KeyErrors()

# 2. During analysis, if a problematic access is found:
# Example: data["secret_token"] where "secret_token" might not exist
error_tracker.add(
    filename="src/auth.py",
    lineno=102,
    namespace="app.auth.get_session",
    key="secret_token"
)

# 3. Generate a report of all found issues
all_errors = error_tracker.get()
for err in all_errors:
    print(f"Potential KeyError in {err['filename']} at line {err['lineno']}")
    print(f"Scope: {err['namespace']} | Key: {err['key']}")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e264c383-bd26-41dc-af12-a61fb0b4854b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"555940fd-cbea-4703-8507-66d13f6b3e7a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Evidence Collection","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By storing the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"filename","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"lineno","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the class ensures that the analysis results are "actionable," allowing developers to jump directly to the code and fix the issue.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9d95c25d-f331-4895-b8bc-a076ddffb25b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Traceability","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Recording the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"namespace","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" provides context, helping to determine if an error is occurring in a high-priority area of the application (like an authentication module) or a low-impact utility.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fb2a246a-a5df-49f9-9318-da53220144b9","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Post-Processing","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Because the data is stored in simple dictionaries, it can be easily exported to JSON, CSV, or rendered into a UI dashboard at the end of the analysis process.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d8e3c0ea-13fe-4018-a5ff-768e5e59fd47","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
